notes: Dashboard v2 is now production-ready and serving as the default. All 5 acceptance criteria fully verified: (1) Responsive design works on tablet 768px with vertical stacking and 40vh/60vh split, and mobile 480px with comprehensive touch-friendly adjustments. (2) Keyboard navigation fully functional with vim-style j/k navigation, p for pause, s for skip, Escape to deselect, ? for help, plus Tab/Enter/Space for interactive elements with visible focus outlines. (3) Works with autonomous orchestrator sessions - displays robot badge for autonomous sessions, uses logSessionId for proper log streaming, shows phase progression. (4) No console errors - robust error handling with try-catch, optional chaining, and fallback values throughout. (5) V2 is now the default dashboard served at root URL, with v1 accessible at /global-dashboard-classic.html.
